errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: A least one upper case letter
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_SYMBOLS: A least one special symbol like :;?!+-.,^@

errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_PREVIOUS: Not one of your {{history}} last passwords
